channel.title: Noomi Rapace on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Noomi Rapace on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Mother’ Review: A Magnetic Noomi Rapace Plays Young Mother Teresa in a Stylistically Spiky Period Piece
item.description: Premiering in the Horizons section at Venice, Macedonian writer-director Teona Strugar Mitevska’s film portrays the Albanian nun known mostly for her work with the poorest in India.

item.title: ‘Mother’ Review: A Magnetic Noomi Rapace Plays Young Mother Teresa in a Stylistically Spiky Period Piece
item.description: Premiering in the Horizons section at Venice, Macedonian writer-director Teona Strugar Mitevska’s film portrays the Albanian nun known mostly for her work with the poorest in India.

item.title: Noomi Rapace on the Complex, “Punk Rock” Take on Mother Teresa in ‘Mother’: “There Are No Saints”
item.description: The star discusses why she wouldn’t have made the film, premiering in Venice’s Horizons program, with anyone but Teona Strugar Mitevska, the director’s feminist approach, and how the church may react.

item.title: Noomi Rapace on the Complex, “Punk Rock” Take on Mother Teresa in ‘Mother’: “There Are No Saints”
item.description: The star discusses why she wouldn’t have made the film, premiering in Venice’s Horizons program, with anyone but Teona Strugar Mitevska, the director’s feminist approach, and how the church may react.
